pullRequest.title: [DOCS] Changes links in stack getting started to point to the Observability guide
pullRequest.bodyText:
Overview
This PR updates the links at the end of the Getting started with the Elastic Stack page to point to the relevant pages in the Observability guide.
Related PR
elastic/docs#1985
Preview
GS with the Stack – What's next?

commit.message: [DOCS] Changes links in stack getting started to point to the Observability guide.
